title: Singapore Households Debt To GDP
description: Households Debt in Singapore decreased to 57.10 percent of GDP in the first quarter of 2022 from 58.30 percent of GDP in the fourth quarter of 2021. Households Debt to GDP in Singapore averaged 43.32 percent of GDP from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 60.20 percent of GDP in the third quarter of 2021 and a record low of 21.80 percent of GDP in the first quarter of 1991. This page provides - Singapore Households Debt To Gdp- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank for International Settlements
